mapper.sql:
FROM infrCodeGroup WHERE 1=1
AND a.ifcgDelNy = 1 AND a.ifcgDelNy = 0
AND a.ifcgName LIKE concat('%',#{shIfcgName},'%')
AND a.ifcgName LIKE concat('%',#{shValue},'%') AND a.ifcgNameEng LIKE concat('%',#{shValue},'%')
mapper.select: select a.ifcgSeq , a.ifcgName , a.ifcgDelNy FROM bts.infrCodeGroup a WHERE 1=1 AND ifcgDelNy = 0
select a.ifcgSeq , a.ifcgName , a.ifcgDelNy from infrCodeGroup a where 1=1 and ifcgDelNy = 0 and ifcgSeq = #{ifcgSeq}

SELECT a.ifcgSeq , a.ifcgName , a.ifcgNameEng , a.ifcgDelNy FROM infrCodeGroup a WHERE 1=1
AND a.ifcgDelNy = 1 AND a.ifcgDelNy = 0
AND a.ifcgName LIKE concat('%',#{shIfcgName},'%')
AND a.ifcgName LIKE concat('%',#{shValue},'%') = 1 AND a.ifcgNameEng LIKE concat('%',#{shValue},'%') = 1
